text: [Music]
I've always wanted to be an entrepreneur
always wanted to start a business I
hooked up with an old friend from high
school he was the product guy I came
from the sales side of the house so he
said great we have a great opportunity
to go build something together and he
had just started and sold a company in
the hotel space and in that process he
learned he was like I was like there is
so much old and antiquated technology
and silo data everywhere that there's
got to be an opportunity to bring modern
software as-a-service
that's super specialized and easy to use
to this industry hotel your's generally
got into the business not because they
like technology but because they really
like people and so their level of
technology may not be as strong as in
certain other industries but we really
kind of look at that as an opportunity
to kind of help them and make sure that
the technology helps them as much as
possible on the flip side the technology
that they're working with is really
challenging so they generally have a
really tricky tech stack many different
systems none of which integrate well
with each other and so a lot of what we
do is to try to make that as seamless as
possible so that the hotelier doesn't
have to worry about that but we pull
pull it all together in a way that makes
it very easy for them to use you're able
to start to see you know how are you
doing visa vie the hotels down the
street you're able to see you know what
are people saying in their freeform text
reviews and how do I then suss out of
that the signal the sentiment so to
speak of whether folks love their stay
or didn't like their stay instead of
thinking about managing a hotel with you
know 300 rooms you're actually really
managing you know a hundred thousand
potential guests who are they what do I
know about them how do i you know stack
rank them how do i segment them how do I
create audiences and how do I speak to
them in the way that you and I as
travelers want to be spoken to
a fundamental place where machine
learning can help is even just to help
the hotel your understand who their best
guests are to begin with so if you talk
to most Hotel years they're very
interested in understanding who their
best guests are a problem with that is
that a guest may stay multiple times
throughout the hotel but that may not
get merged all into the same profile so
you may stay there multiple times but
you show up as 3 to 5 different guest
records even though you should be one so
just doing that profile synthesis in a
really strong way is really foundational
to being able to even have the hotel
users understand who their best guests
are to begin with if you have somebody
that loves you that comes back all the
time will guess what that's also your
very best salesperson for a hotel you
want that person and you want all their
friends in the hotel filling all the
rooms and if you can do that direct
that's the name of the game for a
successful hotel of the future
[Music]
